txt.en: You have discovered recently-harvested crops of Garsfeld inside the half-orc camp. You should recover them for the good of the folk of Garsfeld.

'Thank you for returning these to us. I had assumed they were merely burning our fields to the ground, but I am glad that some of our crops could be saved.\n\n'I will have these crops distributed among the people.'
While battling the half-orc siege of Garsfeld, you discovered surviving crops. The people are Garsfeld sorely need these crops if they are to survive the coming months.
Recently-harvested crops can be found scattered around the half-orc camp.\n\nYou should collect the stolen crops and bring them to Garsfeld.
Talk to Gísling at the Mead Hall of Garsfeld
Gísling can be found in the Mead Hall of Garsfeld, south-west of the half-orc camp.\n\nYou should bring the crops to Gísling.
